lead_paragraph: GRAHAM--Dr. Harold Nathaniel, (July 27, 1921 to December 31, 2015) brilliant and playful, scientist and creator of games, stories, and puns. Traveler and adventurer, he roamed the planet from Bear Mountain, NY, to the Himalayas, San Francisco to the Galapagos, soaking up cultures and landscapes. He delighted in his family: his five children, Peter (Lew), Margy, Vicki (Nat), Rocky (Marjie), and Emily; his five grandchildren, Andrew (Erin), Rae (Billy), Spencer, Jordan (Megan), and Marisa; and his four great grandchildren, Betty, Josie, James, and Charlie. He was devoted to Lillie, his wife of 33 years, and then to Alaine, his wife of 24 years. He is loved and missed by family and friends. Memorial contributions may be made to the Southern Poverty Law Center. 1/3
